subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Florida Derby (Horse Race)
lead_paragraph: Pletcher is expected to run some talented horses in the Kentucky Derby prep races, but his 1-for-40 Derby history underscores how perilous the month ahead may be.
snippet: Pletcher is expected to run some talented horses in the Kentucky Derby prep races, but his 1-for-40 Derby history underscores how perilous the month ahead may be.
